<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Next Node Formatting

Represents `next` keyword

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
[].each { next }
```

After:

```ruby
[].each { next }
```

## Formats with a guard

Before:

```ruby
[].each { next if true }
```

After:

```ruby
[].each { next if true }
```

## Formats with an arg

Before:

```ruby
[].map { next "foo" }
```

After:

```ruby
[].map { next "foo" }
```
